posts.post_content:
Pulled off a huge win with this once.   
  
My opponent had flooded the board with 1/1 wolf tokens, but she only had 3 life. The wolves were \*\*\* everywhere. I had 4 creatures out and it was my turn. I had nothing with which to win, so I just rolled the die until this came up, so I attacked with everything. None of her creatures could block mine and live, which would have siphoned off 4 life, but she couldn't NOT block me either. Good times :)
posts.html:

posts.post_content: I like how it says "anywhere". So even milling goes into effect. They really should make more cards like that. I think [Deathgreeter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Deathgreeter) should have read "from anywhere". (Otherwise, [Soul Warden](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Soul Warden) is better)
